titleStmt.title: The Emperiall acheiuement of our dread soueraigne King Charles together wth ye armes crests supporters & mottowes of all ye seuerall companies & corporations of ye famous citty of London as they now beare them

publicationStmt.publisher: Are to be sould by William Webb at his shopp at ye signe of ye Globe in Cornehill ouer aganist ye Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Consists of engraved title page and at least 60 numbered and 5 unnumbered coats of arms.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shopp at ye signe of ye Globe in Cornehill ouer aganist ye Royall Exchange
